info.name: Qwant DeepDark
info.description:
Light will blind thee in thy search for answers, dark will make them shine. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (Qwant dark theme)

This is a dark theme for Qwant inspired by FT DeepDark.

Also, credit where credit is due for the color palettes. (@KDE, @horst3180, @linuxmint, YouTube and Discord)

Official GitHub page, with screenshots and colors, available here.
